content: उद्घट् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> To open; <ls>Ku. 7. 53.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (घाटयति) {@--1@} To open, unlock; निरयनगरद्वारमुद्घाटयंती <ls>Bh. 1. 63</ls>; कपाटमुद्घाटयामि <ls>Mk. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To peel off, shell. {@--3@} To reveal, expose, make known. {@--4@} To undertake, commence. {@--5@} To rub over, stroke gently, tickle.
